channel.title: ZodiacsReign 9.0 RSPS Server Pack Re-Release 7400 Downloads
channel.description:
[ul][list][list][list][list][center][Img]http://i29.tinypic.com/2u6mw02.png[/img][/center] [center][img]http://s4.tinypic.com/10dfnnc_th.jpg[/img] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/ra6res.jpg[/img] [size=20pt][b]Number one In RSPS Packs Re-Release[/b][/size][/center] [center][b][i]What is ZodiacsReign?[/i] [b][font=Verdana]ZodiacsReign is a RSPS helper containing mostly required programs and files to make your RSPS coding and playing more proficient and easy, Zodiacsreign has been around for almost 2 years and I've been updating for a very long time. In "ZodiacsReign Packages" you will find Tools, Id List , Essentials to make your private server experience a better one.[/b][/center] [color=maroon] [center][b][i] [color=blue]In the new ZodiacsReign 9.0, This is the anniversary edition, I had no idea what to add to this to make it special, But the fact is that this is practically the 9th and final pack, It's special. [/b][/center]
[Center][size=20pt]Download Link~[/size] After [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/seq445.jpg[/img] Before [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/vxja6e.jpg[/img] http://www.mediafire.com/?lzyzwzkwnnm[b] 17.55mb[/b] [img]http://www.mediafire.com/free-file-hosting/mediafire-swoosh.gif[/img] [/center]
[center] [b]What's new? Ventrillo Installation for Mac, Windows & Linux New Auto-Restarter New Command Maker New Character Editor New 525 List's New Price Checker Application Java Fixer Runescape Music for Clients Menu Maker Swiftkit Client Equipment Builder RsClient 317 Autospawn Editor [/b]
[Center][i][size=11pt][b]Features[/b][/center] [center] [b][size=12pt]317 List[/b] [list] [color=orange][list][li]317 Item List[/li][/list] [list][li]317 NPC List[/li] [li]317 Interface List[/li] [li]317 Graphics List[/li] [li]317 Object List[/li] [li]317 Emote List [/li] [li]317 Coordinate List [/li] [li]317 Animation List [/li] [li]And More[/li][/list]
[b][size=12pt][color=green]508 List[/b] [list][li]508 Interface List[/li] [li]508 NPC List [/li] [li]508 Object List[/li] [li]508 Item List[/li] [li]508 Graphics List[/li] [li]508 Hair & Clothes Color List[/li] [li]508 Emotes List[/li] [li]508 Sounds List [/li][/list]
[b][size=12pt][color=blue]Tools[/b] [list][li]Eleclions Server Rebooter[/li] [li]Meiscooldudes Shopmaker & Server Runetime Manager[/li] [li]Hypercam Set-Up[/li] [li]Basic Command Generator[/li] [li]Voule's Auto-Restarter[/li] [li]Voule's Command Generator [/li] [li]Voule's Auto-spawn Generator[/li] [li]Backup Tool[/li] [li]Character Editor[/li] [li]Runescape Windows Client[/li] [li]WinterLove Server[/li] [li]Brand new Shop-Maker[/li] [li]Sprite-Maker[/li] [li]Moparscape Client[/li] [li]Server Item Clearer[/li] [li]525 Item List[/li] [li]Auto-typer & Auto-clicker[/li] [li]And More[/li] [li]More tools then before![/li] [/list]
[b][size=14pt]Picture[/size][/b] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2ivo5md.jpg[/img] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/zvo9s2.jpg[/img][/center]
[Center]
[size=12pt][b]Virus Scan(s)[/b][/size] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/20jfdhs.jpg[/img] [img]http://i26.tinypic.com/331hyf6.png[/img]
[size=19pt]Credits[/size] [b][size=8pt] Cocoa Hidendra The Soul Galkon Jagex LTD SilabSoft Jordan of Pur3z-Scape Justin of Pur3z-Scape Jeremy Yak Voule Meiscooldudes GalkonsPride Community BytyIsle Community Moparscape Community RuneLimited Community Affliction Community Enkrona/Fusion Community A Censored Community Pur3z-Scape Community PloxageScape Community[/size][/b] [Img]http://i29.tinypic.com/2u6mw02.png[/img][center]
[center][size=12pt]Quotes[/size] [b]Lin From Moparscape[/b] : Nice job. Why don't you work on a server though? The packages out there aren't going to get any better than this to be honest.
[b]Galkon Mod of R-S [/b] : Great job, I'll definitely use tools in this.
[b] Hidendra Mopar Vet[/b] : DON'T WORRY THERE'S NO VIRUSES EVERYONE, SO DON'T ASK FOR TWO FUCKING VIRUS SCANS or i will kill you
[b]Cocoa, Blaze-Scape Creator[/b] : I already have this one on my computer, This is the best pack yet imo.
[center][i]ZodiacsReign 9.0 was made by Z 0 D I A C of Moparscape/google Forums & Released on November 26, 2009, This pack was released for learning purposes only, Runescape was made by Jagex[/i][/center]
[color=white][/list][/list][/list][/list][/list][/ul]

@Z_0_D_I_A_C wrote:

[ul][list][list][list][list][center][/center]
[center]

[size=20pt]Number one In RSPS Packs Re-Release[/size][/center]
[center][b]What is ZodiacsReign?
[font=Verdana]ZodiacsReign is a RSPS helper containing mostly required programs and files to make your RSPS coding and playing more proficient and easy, Zodiacsreign has been around for almost 2 years and I’ve been updating for a very long time. In “ZodiacsReign Packages” you will find Tools, Id List , Essentials to make your private server experience a better one.[/center]
[color=maroon]
[center][i] [color=blue]In the new ZodiacsReign 9.0, This is the anniversary edition, I had no idea what to add to this to make it special, But the fact is that this is practically the 9th and final pack, It’s special. [/center]

[Center][size=20pt]Download Link~[/size]
After

Before

http://www.mediafire.com/?lzyzwzkwnnm 17.55mb

[/center]

[center]
What’s new?
Ventrillo Installation for Mac, Windows & Linux
New Auto-Restarter
New Command Maker
New Character Editor
New 525 List’s
New Price Checker Application
Java Fixer
Runescape Music for Clients

RsClient
317 Autospawn Editor
